name: Window.open
description: The Window interface's open() method loads the specified resource into the new or existing browsing context (window, iframe or tab) with the specified name. If the name doesn't exist, then a new browsing context is opened in a new tab or a new window, and the specified resource is loaded into it.
content: The Window interface's open() method loads the specified resource into the new or existing browsing context (window, <iframe> or tab) with the specified name. If the name doesn't exist, then a new browsing context is opened in a new tab or a new window, and the specified resource is loaded into it.
